nodes.text: The Imperial Department of Military Research (IDMR) was a military research organization within the Galactic Empire. The department manufactured the armors used by Imperial stormtroopers, as well as the flight helmets worn by the TIE fighter pilots. It also developed IT-O Interrogation Units in secret, as well as 9D9-s54 Dianoga spy droids.
In 11 BBY, Quelton Fabrication and Cladtech were merged and brought under the control of Military Research.
